markdownRemark.html: Another drawing I drew a while back and just finished this weekend. As we enter week 2 of the Edinburgh Festival Fringe, I imagine most of the performers already, or will inevitably, feel like this within a matter of days. (Click it and it gets big.)

frontmatter.title: Forever Starts and Ends Here
